sentences.en: A surfeit of food makes one sick.
A surfeit of rich food is bad for you.
sentences.cn: 多吃油腻食物对身体有害.

sentences.en: I think we've had a surfeit of this sort of violent film on TV recently.
sentences.cn: 我认为最近电视上播出的这一种暴力影片过多了.

sentences.en: Independent surfeit by an auto rhizoid inspector can be arranged at buyer's account.
sentences.cn: 由授权的检验员独立检测;费用由买方承担.

sentences.en: It's no good for your health to surfeit yourself.
Know, then, that for you is neither surfeit nor content.
sentences.cn: 那么要知道, 你既不会嫌多,也不会知足的.

sentences.en: Rationing had put an end to a surfeit of biscuits long ago.
sentences.cn: 定量供应很久以前就结束了饼干过剩的状况。

sentences.en: Stella - based models such as Limits to Growth possess a remarkable surfeit of feedback circuits.
sentences.cn: 那些以Stella为 基础的模型,比如说“增长的极限”模型,拥有值得注意的过多反馈回路.

sentences.en: The country has a surfeit of cheap labour.
The glutton for two night no sleep can get : the first from surfeit , the second from regret.
sentences.cn: 一次暴食,两一难眠;一夜不适, 一夜悔恨.

sentences.en: The singer's extraordinary reputation ensured a surfeit of eager participants.
sentences.cn: 歌手的杰出的声誉确保了她们踊跃的参与.

sentences.en: There has been a surfeit of plays about divorce on the television recently.
sentences.cn: 最近有关离婚的电视剧过多.

sentences.en: There has been a surfeit of plays about divorce on the TV recently.
sentences.cn: 最近有关离婚的电视剧太多了.

sentences.en: Thus do I pine surfeit day by day.
sentences.cn: 这样,我整天垂涎或整天不消化.

sentences.en: Thus do I surfeit day by day , Or gluttoning on all, or all away.
sentences.cn: 这样,我整天垂涎或整天不消化,我狼吞虎咽, 或一点也咽不下.

words.tran_cn: 过度；饮食过度；恶心（由于饮食过度所引起）
使饮食过度；使厌腻；使过度沉溺于

trans.tran_cn: 过量，过度（尤指饮食），（饮食过度引起的）不适
trans.tran_en: A surfeit of something is an amount which is too large
